content.detailedDescription: it was at 1:10 am sunday i was taking my dogs out to pee it was a beautiful clear night, i enjoy watchimg the airplanes fly from cleveland air port. while one airliner was flying twoards detroit i notic another one flying noryh/west but on a upward angle flying the same speed as the other planes then i realized their were no flashing lighys,the ship was visable from the moon light,but i could not see the moon, but it looked like a plane fuselog but much bigger and it was a lot farther out than i have ever seen a plane fly,i realized it was leaving earyh, all of a sudden it stoped moved sidways yo the left then back to the right then to the left again, a short distance infrount of the ship a larg lihht blue circle with static electricty in it appeard, the ship flew into the circle and disapeard, this all happend in a couple of minites. i rember thinking i hope i wasent yhe onley one to witness that alsome sight.               well that is what i saw and i will never forget it,    randy
content.summary: I seen a ship fly north/west away from earth  and disapear into a large light blue hole then disapeard .

content.detailedDescription: At approximately 7pm i was traveling home on hwy 105 toward hwy 49 east and i noticed immediately after turning onto hwy 105 that there were three bright lights that i casually thought must be lights from a tower and then i noticed the movement in the lights.  the lights weren't in a vertical position, they were in a horizontal formation. the light in the middle and the light on my right came closer to one another and then the light on the right started movement toward my car.  i was slowed to a crawl on watching this and as this light that seemed bright white, like the other two got lower and closer, i could actually see the bottom of this thing.  what i saw was big, triangular-shaped, made no noise, and was heading eastward at a very slow speed.  i was awed, scared, and shaking as i was alone.  i don't necessarily believe in "ufos", but i know that i saw something out of the ordinary for sure.  instead of going home, i went to my mother's home which is located a few blocks from our mainstreet with the two remaining lights in view the entire time.  these two lights appeared to be moving westward.  i got to my mother's home and brought my mother and one of my older sisters out to view these lights when a third light appeared again, close in proximity to the other two  lights.  upon seeing the third light moving toward us, but at a much greater distance than what i had witnessed earlier, my sister said, "it's a helicopter."  then upon seeing the object appear to immediately stop, we witnessed the object shoot straight up at such a speed that it disappeared very quickly. no sound. the sky was completely clear and the weather is unusually cold for this time of year in this area.  we watched these other two lights approximately until 8:30 pm until they moved beyond our view on the city horizon.  i did see aircraft flying at the time of this ascent, but they had flashing red lights clearly visible underneath.  i don't know what i saw, but was dissapointed that there was nothing reported locally.  i can't believe that i'm the only one in this area to see these moving lights.  i guess i just don't want to think that i'm nuts all alone.  i did want more input on what i had possibly seen so i googled ufos and found this site.  thanks.
content.summary: Noiseless, triangular shaped with bluish lights underneath.

content.detailedDescription:
(sorry to be so late submitting this, but saw that the 1/5/2000 sighting is still being investigated and thought this may be connected.)

my son was driving, so his view was mainly through the sunroof, which is tinted.  it was a saturday evening approx. 7:30pm may 21st, 2000.  shortly after we passed the collinsville exit, i saw the ufo, but at first wasn't sure what it was and said, "what is that?  some kind of weird water tower?"  it was about that height-barely over the tree top.  as soon as i said that, we were closer and could see that it was a ufo and we both exclaimed, "it's a ufo" at the same time.  my son pointed at it and tried to get a better view.  

it was about as long as a big semi truck and about as wide top to bottom as a semi from the top to the ground.  the description on tv of the 1/5/2000 sightng is pretty accurate (though i recall the 1/5/2000 being much bigger??)  it had the windows (i believe four) like described.  they were tinted and like a big picture window.  (the windows at a local restaurant remind me of them, size wise, but i have never measured them.) there were red lights on the bottom-i believe three at the back (but might have been five, one at the front point, and possibly 1-2 more, midway on the craft.  one feature that i haven't heard on any of the other reports was a small square tower (approx. 15") with a small rectangular window at the top of the tower.  the tower was at the front point of the triangle.  i felt it was a higher look out point.  it seemed to be too small for a human.  it was about the same height as the craft was from top to bottom.  it was dull black in color.

not a leaf moved on any of the trees as it hovered, no movement, it was just there.  with the windows tinted, we could not see inside.

i can't speak for my son, but as i looked at the ufo, i felt that i was also being observed.  it was a very eerie and creepy feeling.  the hair stood up on the back of my neck and i had goose bumps on my arms.

i have always enjoyed reading about unusual things ufo's, ghosts, whatever, so you would have thought that i would have been excited about seeing it, but my son and i were petrified.  we were not inclined to pull over until we got to the maryville exit (where we were getting off to see my daughter.)  at that time, we tried to see it again from the overpass bridge, but were not able to.

my brothers were both pilots f-4 and f-16, so i have been to my share of air shows.  i have seen the stealth, etc. etc.  it was my distinct impression that this craft had a more advanced technology than we have at this time. i also could not imagine a test plane being tested over a major interstate.  if it were technology that a foreign country has, i can't imagine they would risk being seen, and can't imagine what purpose it might have had in that location of mostly restaurants.

i did make a sketch of it at the time, but have not located it.  i swore my son to secrecy regarding the sighting initially, as i didn't want my daughter to be afraid.  then, when we saw the show about ufo's over southern illinois, and started sharing the information.  

i have heard others say, and it was true for me, that it was hard to quit thinking about it and i would (for example) see a semi truck and think it was about that size. having been interested in ufo's, i have looked out in the night sky, and would not have thought to look in the day light at tree top level!  that "they are here, rather than out there" was an eye opener for me!

my son is a well respected park manager and i am a licensed clinical social worker and work as a dcfs investigator.
content.summary: Driving east on 70  & had just passed collinsville exit..  ufo was hovering at treetop level beside road.

content.detailedDescription:
I was returning home from my relatives with my family late that night (2003 july 27-29 (not sure now), about 11:30 pm (timezone +2 gmt) when after the road curve we all saw the object on our left. i have stopped the car immediately and opened a window. looked back at my parents to make sure they see the same. they just nodded. then we were just standing there or about 10 minutes and observing it.
[size=2][side note - i was always into these kind of things, but i remember saying then loud - oh no, i'm not going there. fear of the unknown, i guess].[/size]
ok, so here is the object - two circles of white bright round lights, smaller one a bit lower than tne bigger one. lights onn both of them were circling clockwise i think (there was some disagreement about the direction afterwards). it hovered in about 50 meters, about 200 meters from the road.
after about 10 minutes it started moving along the road in the direction o marijampol��� (where we were traveling) and a little away. i started the engine and was driving for another 100 meters, then the road turns right. the object was fading as it moved, not because of the distance, but by itself. then it flied further away across the river and was still visible for some time. finally the glow of townlights hid it from our sight.
i'd like to add, that that night was totally dark, but there were no clouds at all - the sky was full of stars.
as for possible explanations, first thought was that it is some projection on the clouds or some light show.. but as i know that place very well, there isn't any such instalations, because its a farmland with a river valley cutting it across, no population on that side of the road whatsoever.
besides, sky was clear, object was very low and bright, and last - the lights were directed to the sides and the object they were circling around, had some volume - lights were visible only in front of the object and hid behind it.
i will post my humble drawing for you to understand better and will try to get google earth coordinates to show you the place.
content.summary: Two circles of white bright round lights, smaller one a bit lower than tne bigger one. lights on both of them were circling clockwise.

content.detailedDescription: On wed 11/19 at approx. 8:16 i was going to the store around 8:20 pm eastern time and roughly in the direction of philadelphia (se from my location) at about 40degrees e x se there were several (approx20-30)vertical white lines (cloud like in color) about 10 degrees in length.  they reminded me of the northern lights but they were white/colorless and they were too far south and not in the northern part of the sky.  i also see on the map that someone from royersford, pa saw the same thing. they almost resembled spot lights being shined directly up but they were too soft in appearance to be spot lights. some appeared to go all the way down to the tree line others faded out before reaching the ground, so if you imagined them as all being at the same distance frow me, some were longer than others. also earlier i thought i saw a spot light n x nw from my location but now i wonder if it was another one of these "lights"  it seemed to me that they were meteorlogical/magnetic in nature but it's nothing i've ever seen b4 and my eyes are always on the skies and stars. they did not move (like vertical contrails) and inspired no feelings of fear in me, only ..Wow.. look at that! if you even glimpsed at that part of the sky you could not miss them. they were spread out across about 90degrees azimuth and 10-20 degrees of declination.  i actually tried to drag my mother out to look at them but it was too cold for  her.  i did tell the woman working at the rite aid that i went to. does anybody have a clue what this was? i would love to hear from anybody else that saw them.
content.summary: Vertical lines in sky

content.detailedDescription: At first thought they were contrails, but there were too many and they were too neatly aligned; very vivd, very strange because the sky was lit in that direction and it was three hours past sunset
content.summary: Vivid streaks of non moving light in the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving to my sisters house down union hills around 7pm traveling east from i-17(north phx area), noticed object in the distance about 40 degrees off horizon.  thought object at first to be a helicopter but noticed the lights were brighter (larger appearance), lights did not strobe as such and object didn't appear to be moving around.  there were a lot of air planes and a few helicopters flying around at the time as well, (note that deer valley airport is within 3 miles). i started to think that the planes were taking an interest to the object and it appeared that the planes may have been making some fly-by's of the object.  i arrived at my sisters place which was less than a mile from the location i first noted seeing the object. i looked up and still saw the object and was at about the same degree from the horizon but had been moving west during the drive and noticed it was looking brighter/larger due to it getting closer. the light would stay solid for a few seconds then dim and alternate at different frequencies.  i had my sister and her husband come out to look at it with me and we watched it for awhile and could notice it moving west very slowly.  noting the appx. angle of degree it was at and moving to the west the object may have been a 1000ft in the air. at about 7:45pm the object stopped moving and the light would pulse from bright to dim for another minute or so more then stopped and vanished. also noted, there was no sound to it, there were however plenty of planes and helicopters to compare the object to for the entire duration as they were in constant flight.  

have no thought to what it may be, only per my observation it was not an airplane nor helicopter.  flare or balloons would be ruled out for me as well. there were plenty of planes flying in the area and i would be surprised if there wasn't any reports of the object by them to the tower at deer valley airport.
content.summary: Slow pulsating red object

content.detailedDescription:
I was in my car driving home and had just turned from hwy 965 onto us hwy 61 north.  as i crossed over the thompson creek bridge, i looked over toward the west and witnessed a large hazy light-green glowing object traveling at extremely high speed.  it appeared to be heading in a north-westerly direction and it disappeared as i was driving and the treetops blocked my view.  in all, the sighting lasted about 3 seconds.

the object was much larger than any aircraft or star i've ever seen, and much much larger than anything that should've been traveling that close to the ground.  it had just appeared in the sky, (as soon as i had looked over it had appeared) and did not stop but sped off extremely quickly.
content.summary: Very large green light traveling extremely fast over treetops.

content.detailedDescription:
Not sure if this is considered ufo.  my daughter, her girlfriend and i were driving home from trenton nj on rte 1 going south, while looking out the driver side window and left front quarter of the windsheild we saw a stream of lights coming from the sky towards the ground.  it looked like the northern lights but without color. there was 6-8 streams of them they would fade and become bright.  
i saw it first but did not mention it to my daughter and then she said "mom, what is that?".  we watched it for about 10-15 minutes as we drove to drop off her girlfriend.  we all had the same thought wow thats strange northlights here.  then my daughter said maybe it was a ufo or aliens.  then we found out that there was all these sightings in the same area in the last year.  
again, not sure if this is considered a ufo, but i have never in my 40+ years have seen lights like these in this area. 
we tried to take photos on my cell phone but was unable too it would not show up.
content.summary: Read below.

content.detailedDescription: I was walking from one building to another at work when i saw what look like a dim light star to the southwest but it instantly became brighter and was moving very fast toward me going northeast. the object was very brite, i thought it might be the landing lights on a plane, but as it passed over head i never saw any blinking of any kind and if it was a jet (because of the rate of speed it was going) it had no sound that i could make out. as it went into the northeast sky it dimmed and vanished. the only explanation i can think of is that it was a satalite, but afterward there was a large amount of air traffic then there usually is at this time of evening. i just happen to catch to whole episode, because i have gotten into the habit of looking into the sky due to the number of ufo sightings in stephenville. i felt like i was loosing my mind at what i was seeing and there not being any logical explanations for it other than it being a satalite, but like i said the air traffic got heavy afterward, which makes me wounder what did i see.
content.summary: Brite object going southwest to north east at low altitude

content.detailedDescription: I went outide to take my dogs for a walk i often look up at the sky, on this occassion i observed an object hovereing i looked at object thrue my telescope and observed it changing colors from green to red to white, then moving up and right, then dissappearing, this same object was seen on previous nights by myself and my wife. on previous sunday at about 7:30 pm i was again walking my dog and observed what i thought was a star but was just above tree top level we examined this for a while then when we came back it was gone this object was very bright in color.
content.summary: Object sited n/e over bay, hovering and changing colors,moving.

content.detailedDescription:
sent: wednesday, october 29, 2008 2:40 pm
to: hq@mufon.Com
subject: ufo sight in franklin tn 10-26-08

 

i tried submitting from your site but a problem exist with the state county field.

 

at approximately 12:40a.M. on october 26, 2008 (early sunday morning) i was going out to get the dog when i noticed a large reddish orange light in the ne sky. i thought it was a "harvest moon: rising particularly covered by clouds. but when i looked closer i realized that's not what it was at all. it was a slightly cone shaped fire ball that would grow in intensity as the object would move rapidly either to the right or straight up.

 

at first it was drifting to the left then would move rapidly back to the right to it's original position. it did that several times over about a 2 - 3 minute time span. i yelled for my wife to come out but she couldn't hear me so i ran into the house to get her hoping the object would still be there once we returned, and it was. she was amazed. we continued to observe the light object for an additional 5 minutes or so. during that time and on one occasion it shot dramatically in an upward and to the right. another time it shot straight up to about three times higher then the original position. each time it would make those really fast movements the reddish orange glow would intensify. after the one time it shot straight up, it slowly and erratically worked itself back to the original position and then pretty quickly just faded away. not as it were leaving but just faded away.

 

i called the williamson county sherriff department as well as the franklin review appeal newspaper to see if anyone else had seen or reported this. from our position it seemed to be about 5 - 7 mile away, above the tree line and was about the size if 1/5 the size of a full moon. it was fairly large. i would have thought more people would have seen it but we were told by the authorities and the newspaper that no one else had reported seeing anything like that.

 

iʼm 54 years old and an owner of a financial institution marketing company and not know to be a weird or crazy person who sees strange things. this sighting was a plane as the nose on my face. there was no mistaking this light was moving around like something i have never seen before. with plenty of time to watch it i tried to discount it has a hot air balloon or something like that but the movements explained that away quickly. iʼm only glad my wife was able to see it and backup my story.
content.summary: Ufo sighting.

content.detailedDescription: My daughters and i were getting out of the car and we noticed three planets aligned in the sky.  then two seconds later the star on top started to move.  we could not stop looking.  it was as large as the 2 planets in the sky.  and just as bright.  we live in graham and we see many, many airplanes flying from and to dfw.  it was not an airplane.  there were no red lights flashing and usually we see these.  also, we can hear the planes just after they fly by.  this had no sound. for some reason i got the impression it was very high in the sky.  i have seen the space station many times and it was not that either.  was it a ufo?  not sure.  it was headed ne and if someone else sees something with more detail, i just wanted to say that we saw something also.  i hope this helps.  please call for details.  i have never reported anything before.  this object was moving smoothly at a constant speed.  it did not vanish;it faded from view like any object that would fly away.  i cannot say enough times how brilliantly bright it was!!!  thank you.
content.summary: Very large extremely bright star

content.detailedDescription: I stepped out at about 6:00 p.M. on today and was smoking a cigarette on my patio ,when my cat starting acting a little strange,alot of meowing(hardly does it).I started playing the with the cat when i notice something really ,bright in my perpherial vision(i was kinda bent over).Ilooked up and saw this large bright ,white object moving at a fast speed and it had no soud to it.I checked the object for other colored lights,but their was none on it.Another smallerlight which belonged to a plane was like trying to follow ,butwas a long way back and moving way slower,but a t a  fast pace also(looked like jet).Object was moving so fast too be they the sixe it was and finally started srinking in size and changed color from the white to a reddish color and disappeard ou of site. i have seen ufo's before and i believe i was abducted in the end of the year 2000.On that incident for about 4-5 months i noticed a bright star during the day time ,but it seemed like the object was communciating with me.I became obessed with ideas for new inventions,i ended submitting the idea for digital camera binoculars,wireless internet w/small plug-in box(alltel/att) and a new energy drink with which coca cola contacted me about .I also felt i was led to tell people that a real bad winter strom was going to hit christmas day(warzone).I told people in know about 3 months before it acually hit on christmas day.Thwe worst ice strom in history for most southern states.Before tonight i had my real last up close contact thanksgivig eve 2005 around 9:00 p.M. and that lasted about 20 minutes or so.I am ready for them to reveal themselves to the masses because maybe if the rest of the world see at they do exist,maybe we whouldn't have all this chaos and wars going on.If most the world believe in some kind of god,then why can't they believe in aliens?
content.summary: Step outside and my cat was acting a little crazy.I saw something really bright in my perpherial vision and looked in the sky,something was moving at very fast speed.The object was bright white and very large oval shaped.Disappeared shortly.Wasn't meteor.

content.detailedDescription: My daughters and i were getting out of the car and we noticed three planets aligned in the sky.  then two seconds later the star on top started to move.  we could not stop looking.  it was as large as the 2 planets in the sky.  and just as bright.  we live in graham and we see many, many airplanes flying from and to dfw.  it was not an airplane.  there were no red lights flashing and usually we see these.  also, we can hear the planes just after they fly by.  this had no sound. for some reason i got the impression it was very high in the sky.  i have seen the space station many times and it was not that either.  was it a ufo?  not sure.  it was headed ne and if someone else sees something with more detail, i just wanted to say that we saw something also.  i hope this helps.  please call for details.  i have never reported anything before.  this object was moving smoothly at a constant speed.  it did not vanish;it faded from view like any object that would fly away.  i cannot say enough times how brilliantly bright it was!!!  thank you.
content.summary: Very large extremely bright star

content.detailedDescription:
1. i was on the 22nd floor of a building located between 42nd and 43rd on the 1st avenue, new york city.  the sky was very clear and not dark yet.

2. a bright light was seen from the window when i was speaking to my colleague.

3. i thought an aeroplane or a helicopter. 

4. but it was very bright and only moved slightly.  i went back to my office on the same floor, and gazed at the light for sometime.  two other lights appeared horizontally to the light i fist was looking at.  i let my another colleague see the lights and asked for his views.  he was of the view that the lights were some kind of aeroplanes'.  

i looked around in search for flights to and from jfk and helicopters.  a few helicopters i saw were not putting lights on as it was still not dark.  the direction of those lights did not seem to be the same direction of jfk which should be north-east. as well, i have never seen such lights in that direction.   

5. i wonder what these lights were.  it did not seem to me an aeroplane judging from its move (did not move much);their brightness; and appearing and disappearing.

6. they just disappeared.
content.summary: Three lights appeared in the sky in the east

content.detailedDescription:
Took my dog for a walk and in the dusk sky were 2 bright stationary lights over orland park. the sun was going down and it was a pleasant temperature. asked a police officer what they were and he said they were satellites. airplanes were flying behind it in the distance. can satellites hang that close? could they be local satellites?
he said he didn't know. i have never seen them before and i have returned home and they are still there. unfortunately my camera isn't picking them up. these are not stars. if they were, i would be able to see more in the sky. the whole sky was devoid of stars. the day and evening have been sunny, clear and 50 degrees. i watched them for about 20 minutes to see if they would move, but they didnt. i am still seeing them but only out of a corner window. other homes are blocking my view of both.
content.summary: 2 bright stationary lights.

content.detailedDescription: Clear sunny day in st. petersburg, russia. observed small dark object above cloud at about 30 degree elevation. suspected it was a helicopter. no sound. estimated distance: 5 - 40 miles away. observed several (6-12) smaller dark objects above the main object. appeared like black toy balloons with no formation. i photographed at 3x optical with canon s-80 camera. see ufoa.Jpg. see small dot above central cloud and many spheres above it. the objects moved as a group to my right about 10 degrees into a cloud. i snapped a second picture which shows the larger object in greater detail upon enlargement as a weird shape but still unrecognizable. the larger object is visible inside the small cloud and a few of the smaller spheres also are visible both inside and outside the cloud. see ufob.Jpg. time between photos is about 1 minute or less. upon enlargement, the spheres resolve to a bright center surrounded by a darker circumference. i verified the visual sighting with another person sitting beside me. the two pictures demonstrate that these objects are real and not lens dust. extreme computer enlargement is necessary to see these objects. an even larger faint black halo also extends way outside some of these objects, perhaps an artifact of the ccd and not a real effect. these objects are similar to photos displayed by jaimie massoun (sp?) of sa sightings. does anyone know what these objects are? domestic or alien? possible weather balloons?
content.summary: Observed several unknown objects 5-20 mi. away

content.detailedDescription:
Time: 9:10p.M.
place: victoria, texas
area: burroughville rd., fm 2615, wischkaemper rd.
conditions: after dusk.  sky moderately cloudy, clear, full moon, no visibility hinderances.

description:  at about 9:10p.M. i was driving down burroughsville road when i noticed a bright object sitting stationary in the southern sky.  the sky was clear and all that could be seen was a bright full moon and this object, no stars were present at the time.  i then stopped my car on the side of the road to get a better look at the object.  i rolled down my window to get a clear view out of the passenger side door when the object began to move in an easterly direction.  i observed the object for about a minute, then it stopped.  the object stayed stationary for about another minute and then began moving again in upward motion.  the object stopped and then after a few seconds, began moving easterly again.  i started my car and then drove onwards down the road while making sure to keep an eye on the object as i drove.  there were no other visible objects in the sky other than the moon.  as i headed home, which was in a southeastern direction, the object continued to move with the same erratic flight pattern, periodically stopping and then moving once again.  i arrived at home and still saw the object off to the southeastern sky.  i called my mother and brother to come look at the object, which at that time was stationary.  the time was about 9:18.  we observed the object for approximately 10 more minutes.  from the time that i entered my house to inform my mother and brother, to the time that we returned outside, the object stayed in the same place.  the object then began to move after several minutes, and then began to move erratically once again.  the object moved upwards in altitude, and then would stop and move downwards and then towards the east.  i had brought out a pair of binoculars to get a better view of the object, and from what i could tell, it was shaped like an elongated circle which had lights going down the middle of its center going lengthwise.  the object continued to move towards the east and then stopped again.  it then ascended upwards and was gone from view.  i am absolutely sure that this object was neither an airplane nor a helicopter.  the object was able to hover and move in all directions unlike an airplane and it was at much too high of an altitude to be a helicopter.  no other objects or celestial phenomenon were present in the sky at the time other than the moon.  i have no other explanation for the object other than to say that it was a ufo.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Elongated circle (oval) with numerous lights running down the middle.

content.detailedDescription: In sw parker county, about 8 miles southwest of the joint reserve base (formerly carswell afb), i was doing yard work.  it was overcast and i happened to look up and at about the 2 o'clock position east i saw a pinkish glow moving perfectly horizontal;  stopping; moving again; and, then accelerating at an impossible speed (as if it almost just disappeared) to the north. i could not see the object itself, just the glowing outline within the clouds as if a very large, bright oval object was there.  it appeared to be much larger than any aircraft; made no sound; stayed on a horizontal plane from south to north.  i have never seen anything like this in my life and have reserved judgment on the existence of ufo's, but this went a long ways to making me a believer.  it put me in a mild state of shock that i had witnessed this and wished my husband had been here to experience this. we live in the country under the flight path of helicopters, jets, airliners and other aircraft and see (and hear) those every day.  this was definitely not any aircraft i am aware of in size, shape, movement or sound. wow!
content.summary: Pinkish oval shape in clouds moving horizontally over sw parker county, texas

content.detailedDescription:
Date of sighting: november 18, 2008
location: jacksonville, florida, standing in front of my house in the driveway
estimated time of sighting: between 6:30 and 7:00 pm, shortly after sun set.
we have also had other sightings some similar and some completely different, within the past 2 to 3 weeks leading up to tuesday night 11/18/08. this night by far was the most activity we have seen in one night and this night by far had the most unusual and bizarre activity we had ever seen which is what prompted my report.

these are the occurrences my two sons and i saw in the sky on november 18, 2008 between 6:30 pm and 7:00 pm with the naked eye.

i was outside star gazing; we have been seeing unusual occurrences in the sky almost nightly for the past several weeks since the first unusual occurrence,i have been compelled to watch the night sky.

first sighting (lasted about 90 seconds) ��� i saw a brightly lit object run through the sky from west to south. objects origination point is unknown; as object raced to the west i heard a strange high pitch sound. object disappeared after it moved to the west and out of my viewing range.

second sighting (lasted about 2 minutes) ��� within 2 to 4 minutes following the first sighting i saw a triangle shaped craft moving from north to south, it appeared to be silver/metallic in appearance with no hard or sharp edges; all points on the object seem to be rounded in appearance as moved low over our neighbor���s house. the craft made absolutely no sound as it disappeared to the south over the tree line.

third sighting (lasted for a one to two seconds) ��� i was looking at the sky in the south direction and saw a star looking object fizzle out toward the east, this may just have been a meteor in the sky, but due the first two sighting i thought it should be noted. 

fourth sighting (lasted for a one to two seconds) ��� my two sons joined my outside shortly after the third sighting, i told them about the first, second and third sightings and instructed them to look towards specific directions in the sky, my oldest son i instructed to look north and northwest, my youngest son i instructed to look towards the northeast and i resumed looking to the south, southwest and southeast. as the three of us looked in different directions assuring we did not miss anything that may pop up in the sky for a brief moment my youngest son was looking toward the south and said he had saw the silver triangle shaped craft move from the tree line briefly and went back out of sight behind the tree line. i was able to confirm that he saw exactly what i did during the second sighting due to the fact the only information i had giving him about this object was that is was shaped like a triangle, he was never told of the color or what it appeared to look like other than shape.

fifth sighting (lasted about 3 to 4 minutes) ��� my oldest son who was looking north and northwest alerted me to what he was seeing, my oldest son is highly into in astronomy and science and is the biggest skeptic i know. he always has a logical reason things that seem to move and look weird in the sky, however this time that was not the case. the object my oldest son saw looked like venus looks in the sky when viewable; the major difference was this object was more of a redder hue than venus is. now there is no mistaken that this object was not venus as the object was moving south to southwest and then to the north, as the object was moving it looked approximately the size of a basket ball the shape appeared to be spherical once the object turned to the north my oldest son stated it looked as if the object elongated and it began to grow dimmer, dimmer again and dimmer once more and then it was gone. it looked as if it completely disappeared or move out of the atmosphere so fast it was not viewable to us with the naked eye. 

sixth sighting (lasted about 3 minutes) ��� this sighting was indeed the strangest, shortly following the fifth sighting we had with the glowing spherical object, we saw another star like object in the sky overhead, this one was also moving in the north direction, the occurrence that made this one the strangest is not the shape, size, and movement of the object, it was what seemed to be chasing this object. not 2 seconds after we saw this object take off in the sky moving north, a jet or plane and i am not sure the type or if it was commercial or military took off after it. the object is was after was still moving in the north direction and the jet/plane was gaining on it, this went off for a minute or so and at this point my sons and i thought it was going to catch the star like object as it at this point was real close to it. as soon as the jet/plane caught up, the object immediately accelerated and shot up higher in the sky from the jet/plane. the jet/plane looked like it was trying to follow, but a second later return to the position it was at before the object took off higher in the sky. i am not sure if the object climbed to high for the jet/plane to follow, but it was very apparent, what ever this star liked object was it was definitely after it.

our feelings about these events and the several others we have had in the past several weeks have been of excitement, baffled and very intrigued about what we are seeing. my husband, two sons and i are of sound mind and above average intelligence, we are very logical and not ones to jump to the conclusion that what we saw was in fact of alien origin, however what we have seen is nothing we can identify through first hand knowledge or through internet research.

i unfortunately do not have any pictures or video's, my camera does not take good pictures in the dark and i do not have a video camer, however i will be borrowing my in-laws video camera tonight to have on hand just in case these objects show up again.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Several objects seen over jacksonville, florida for a 1 to 2 hour duration.

content.detailedDescription: I was walking from the back porch of my house to the pool house to get something from our freezer out there.  when in the corner of my eye i first noticed the bright object.  it took a few seconds to realize it was not a star or planetary object.  it was slowly without any noise whatsoever, gracefully moving from the southeast toward the northeast.  i also looked immediately to the sotuhwest where i knew that jupiter and venus were visible in the night sky.  then back to the object as it was continuing on it's path to the northeast.  it was at an altitude of about 1500 to 2000 feet best guess.  star like in appearance with very very bright and very white light.  highly intense light not like a light bulb but more intense celaner white light.  location is about lat. 31deg31min and long. -90deg15min. where sighting occurred. i watch airplanes all the time and this was not one of them.  there were no aircraft flashing beacons on this object.  i called for my daughter to bring me the camera so i could possibly snap a picture of object as it headed away.  just as i had focused the object in the veiwer it cut out the light as if it knew i was going to photograph  it.  this was probably an coincidence but strange nonetheless.  i could still make out the object after this happened barely and then bam!  it just disappeared at around 5:59pm cst.   time of sighting was 5:55pm cst as i looked my watch when i first saw object.
content.summary: Like  a bright very intense white star cruising the sky

content.detailedDescription: My daughter and i were in the backyard on our porch watching airplane comtrails off to the west/southwest.  i happened to look up at the sky to the east and saw a bright flashing object quite high in the sky. at first i thought it looked like a metallic object reflecting the sun.  i mentioned to my daughter that it was kind of early for the stars/planets to be out so soon and so brightly.  she saw it and said it was strobing and she saw colors - white, blue and red.  i then looked back over to the western/southwestern sky and could just barely begin to make out the two brightest lights at dusk, jupiter and venus.  we stood out there for about 20 minutes and i continued to watch both the strobing light and the planets.  as the planets became brighter in intensity, the strobing light became fainter until at just about sundown, the strobing light completely disappeared, and the usual planets and stars became brighter.  i didn't think stars/planets did that, fading away in the early evening sky.  for the next several days, i went back out to the deck and stood in the exact same place at the exact same time frame and i still have not seen that object return.
content.summary: Flashing object in sky disappeared at sundown.

content.detailedDescription:
I woke up to the sound of a cycling humming noise. looked out my bedroom window and saw what looked to be a group of lights circling a oval shaped object back to the southwest of my house. appeared to be less than 100 feet from the ground. the various number of lights circled the oval shaped unknown craft. there where more than 10 lights that i could see moving in a counter clockwise motion. it only lasted a few minutes, as i was froze in a fixed stare, as i was petrified and could not move. my heart was racing and i ran into the other end of the house to tell my mom and dad. i was shaking like a leaf when i got to my mothers bedside. she got up and put her robe on and came to my bedroom and the craft was gone. my mom asked me if i could be dreaming. definately not, i had just turned off the tv around 12:00 midnight and that is when i heard the loud humming sound, making a pulsing type sound. that is what made me get out of bed to see where the noise was coming from. that is when i saw the circling lights.
i can send you a drawing of the craft if you would like for me to.
thank you.
kayla caldwell
content.summary: Heard a loud huming noise outside my bedroom window , pulled blinds and it was above back of neighbors house

content.detailedDescription: My husband & i just got done splitting and stacking our firewood and looked up to see a bright object. it was about 75 degrees up to the south and east. there were some clouds and jet trails lingering. i ran inside to get my camera to take some pictures, (i have a video camera but all of my tapes are full)my husband got his binoculars. it seemed to be staying in the same spot. i took a few pictures then came inside to look on the computer to make sure it wasn't a sattelite or a planet, there were none in that area, there was venus and jupiter way to the south but they were still not visible to us. i grabbed my telephoto lense (3x)and put it on the camera to take more photos. the object had moved towards the north west and was straight obove our heads. just about then (about 5-10 mins after we first saw it) the kids came home and we had them look also, i had my son bring out the telescope and sight it in. looking at it in the telescope it looked like a large bright bubble and we could see a smaller sphere cicling it, what i saw looked like it was slowly swinging back and forth and what my son saw (he was looking at it longer) was that it was going around the larger object in a random erractic way. we couldn't see if it was attached by anything. the sphere started moving faster to the north and we could hardly keep it in the telescope sight. my son took the telescope to the backside of the house to try to keep an eye on it longer. i called my sister, and reached her husband, to see if she could see it from the next town over, they could not see anything but clouds. while i was talking to him the object went dim though i could still see it. my son lost sight of it. one of the clouds moved over it and at first i could still see it but then lost it as the cloud got thicker. we couldn't find it after that. i did get one picture that shows the smaller object. i am including that photo and the same one cropped and enlarged.
content.summary: Bright white sphere with a smaller sphere circling it

content.detailedDescription:
It was between 9:20 and 9:25 pm.  i let the dog outside.  i stood in the backyard waiting for the dog.  i noticed an extremely bright orb suddenly appear in the sky.  it was very bright orange/yellow color.  kinda reminded me of a flashlight being turned on in complete darkness.  it was just suddenly there.

i guess it was somewhere in the sky over land o lakes or wesley chapel.  in between the two cities i guess.  often see planes flying to tampa intl. to land but this light had to be around ten times bigger many, mnay times more bright than a plane approaching for a landing.

this is the fourth or fifth time i've seen objects and lights in the sky since march 2008.  i really think there must be something going on in the area or something attacts this activity.

the sighting was no longer than two seconds.  and then the light just vanished.
content.summary: Extremely bright big light/orb object

content.detailedDescription:
Two arcs of flashing red and white lights, each about the size of the end of a thumb nail held at arm's length, viewed for about five minutes in the no-fly zone above aldermaston - the uk's atomic weapons establishment (awe) - at 7.30 pm last evening.

the sky was black, cold and very clear, full of stars and with many planes flying to and from heathrow airport, about 40 miles away.

seen through binoculars, the arcs appeared to be flying at about the height of a commercial plane, and showed as fast flashes of red and white lights. they zipped about the sky, moving randomly up or down, right or left, with each change of direction crossing some hundreds of feet of sky in the blink of an eye.

after five minutes of these erratic manoeuvres, they faded from sight.
content.summary: Two arcs of flashing lwhite and red lights leaping about the night sky over aldermaston, uk

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were driving west on the south loop in stephenville ,texas at 7 pm cst tonight 11/18/08. i first thought it was a b-52 only 1,000 feet away sse. i discussed the event tonight with a recently retired high ranking military commander that confirmed it was not military flares as was told to me by a sherrif's deputy immediately after tonights sighting . it was for real , i am 63 years old and have never seen anything resembling this. we saw 4 bright round lights in a straight horizontal line and then 4 more appeared to the west with a skipped space in between. the left lights went off and then came immediately back on with one new light above the west lights. then total darkness. no sound. could have been 300 yards to a mile in width. could not determine exact distance away. time elaspe 10 seconds. no time for camera. looked at one time exactly like phonix lights. a friend located about 1 mile to the nw and i were talking on cell and he saw the same lights. three other people i talked to saw the same occurance. i was very excited and could not accuretly spell words on my computer when i returned home .
content.summary: 4 bright lights in straight  line then 4 more in same straight line . very bright and went off and on for 10 seconds.

content.detailedDescription:
My 11 yr old daughter and her friend also 11 were helping me cover the orange trees down our 600 foot long driveway as we are rural with 11 acres because of a hard freeze tonite. as we were looking to the north sky i saw a very bright oval light no flashing lights and it was moving faster than a jet but not in the flight paterns of commercial flights i said hey kids this isn't a plane lets watch it! for maybe 20 seconds it sped across the sky maybe 15 - 20% of the horizon. it slowed down and then shot straight up becoming a pinpoint of light and then just disappeared. this was my daughters 2nd sighting and strangly enough it was exactly 3 years to the day!

we always watch meteor showers and tonite was the last night of the leonids. we know this wasn't a meteor because meteors dont change their minds and go back up. we are avid skywatchers. i have had 19 sightings since 1965.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: White oval brighest in sky.

content.detailedDescription:
I saw a ufo twice today, in two different locations.  i have seen the same aircraft 7 times now in the last month.  i am a well-educated woman in her 20's who is not crazy, but i can't explain what they are.  the aircraft is shaped like a trapezoid (although it may be a triangle- i only see it at night), and has two extremely bright "headlights."  on the two corners that stick out most there are lights.  one has a red light, and the other has a green light.  the colored lights lead me to believe that it is man-made, but i'm not aware of any aircraft like it.  

it doesn't have wings like an airplane, and it doesn't fly like an airplane.  it hovers over an area, very low.  i frequently see them when i drive west on the pa turnpike tuesday evenings.  i drive from the willow grove exit to the downingtown exit.  tonight i saw the ufo at 6pm in southampton, pa when i was driving.  then i saw it again (or another one) 1 mile from the downingtown exit of the turnpike while i was driving.  that one turned all of its lights off a few times, plunging it into darkness.  i thought that was odd.  last week my husband was in the car with me and saw it, too.  he didn't know what it was either.  

i didn't think it was safe to pull over to get a better look, so i kept driving and eventually lost sight of them due to trees, since they were flying low.
content.summary: I saw two identical ufos this evening about 45 miles apart.
